metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17540 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The gmp plugin in strongSwan before 5.7.1 has a Buffer Overflow via acrafted certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

charon-cmd - 5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8
libcharon-extra-plugins - 5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8
libstrongswan - 5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8
libstrongswan-extra-plugins - 5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8
libstrongswan-standard-plugins - 5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8
strongswan - 5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8

criterions.comment: strongswan package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.3.5-1ubuntu3.8').
